I'm going to ding myself on terminology usage.

>
>So the ETag would be for the new resource, not the base resource.
>

Should have been, "So the ETag would be for a representation of the new 
resource, not derived from the source file."

Because, of course, the new resource is also a representation of the 
base resource.

-Eric
